stories.title: The Ember That Would Not Die
stories.body: In a quiet valley, a wanderer carried a single ember through storms. The ember warmed tired hands and kept the path alive. Each night the fire taught patience — that small steady things become strong when tended with faith.

stories.title: The Trader Who Lost the Stars
stories.body: There was once a young trader who chased bright lights and lost the stars. He learned that the quiet flame of a humble heart guides farther than the flash of trophies — and so he returned to the fire to learn how to lean.
